metadata.title: Futura - Live Forever
metadata.description: Your digital vault for memories that matter.

scene1.title: Creating Memories
scene1.description: Throughout life, we create precious memories with loved ones.

scene2.title: Generations Together
scene2.description: These memories connect generations and tell our family stories.

scene3.title: Life's Transitions
scene3.description: When loved ones pass, their memories become even more precious.

scene4.title: Unexpected Loss
scene4.description: Disasters and technology changes can erase our digital legacy.

scene5.title: Preserved Forever
scene5.description: With Futura, your memories are safe and accessible for generations.

valueJourney.conclusion: Don't risk losing what matters most. Preserve your legacy with Futura.

footer.tagline: Made with ❤️ between Berlin, Marseille and Lisbon

upload.title: Leave One Item Behind
upload.subtitle: Upload a photo, document, or any file that represents a memory you want to preserve.

profile.title: Your Digital Vault
profile.subtitle: Here's where your memories live forever.
